item.description: The White House releases a new National Security Strategy emphasizing manufacturing independence, Indo-Pacific security, and higher NATO defense spend...

item.title: Bernie Sanders Echoes Pope Leo's Warning On AI, Says Technology Must Serve The Common Good— Not Concentrate Wealth And Power In Big Tech
item.description: Sen. Bernie Sanders (I-Vt.) echoed Pope Leo XIV's call for ethical artificial intelligence (AI) development on Friday. read more

item.title: Trump Allies Voice Support As Elon Musk's X Slapped With $140 Million EU Fine— 'Impose Sanctions...'
item.description: Trump allies have voiced their support after the European Union fined Elon Musk's social media firm X €120 million ($140 million) on Friday. read more

item.title: Trump's Push To Redefine US Birthright Citizenship Faces Supreme Court Review
item.description: On Friday, the Supreme Court agreed to hear a pivotal challenge to President Donald Trump's order restricting birthright citizenship. read more
